sentence.Network_en: "Monopoly" is one of the best-selling games of all time.
sentence.Network_cn: “大富翁”是有史以来最畅销的游戏之一。

sentence.Network_en: Had he succeeded, he would have acquired a monopoly.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是他当时成功了，他就会取得垄断地位。

sentence.Network_en: In the past central government had a monopoly on television broadcasting.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去，中央政府对电视节目播放实行垄断。

自然垄断（NATURAL MONOPOLY）：是指当规模经济表现为平均成本在整个需求范围内下降时，从经济上看，整个行业在只有一个 …
何谓自然独占（natural monopoly）？自然独占下的订价方式有那些？
第七章不完全竞争市场第一节完全垄断一、完全垄断市场的概念及形成的原因概念:完全垄断(complete monopoly)是指供给只有惟一的一个厂商,厂商可以控制和操纵市场的.
最满意答案垄断价格( monopoly price)垄断价格就是垄断组织垄断组织在销售商品或购买生产资料生产资料时， 凭借其垄断地位所规定的、旨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek monopōlion, from monos 'single' + pōlein 'sell'

entry.def: If  a company, person, or state has a monopoly on something such as an industry, they have complete control over it, so that it is impossible for others to become involved in it.

example.ex: ...Russian moves to end a state monopoly on land ownership.
example.tran: 俄国人采取的终止国家垄断土地所有权的措施

example.ex: ...the governing party's monopoly over the media.

entry.def: A monopoly is a company which is the only one providing a particular product or service.
If you say that someone does not have a monopoly on something, you mean that they are not the only person who has that thing.

example.ex: Women do not have a monopoly on feelings of betrayal.
example.tran: 被出卖的感觉并非只有女性才有。

means.word_mean: 1. (economics) a market in which there are many buyers but only one seller;

sentences.sentence: "when you have a monopoly you can ask any price you like"

means.word_mean: 2. exclusive control or possession of something;

stems_affixes.word_buile: mono单个,一个+atom原子+ic的→adj.[化]单原子的
mono单个,一个+ton声音+ous……的→一个声音→单调的
mon=mono单个,一个+arch统治者→一个统治者
mono单个,一个+gamy婚姻→n.一夫一妻制
mono单个,一个+graph写→写一个主题→专题论文
mono单个,一个+lith石头→n.独块巨石
mono单个,一个+logu说话+e→一个人说话→独白
mono单个,一个+mania狂→对一事的热狂→偏执狂
mono单个,一个+poly卖→独家卖→垄断

means.word_mean: 垄断, 专卖, 专营服务；被垄断的商品（或服务）

sentences.en: His monopoly of shipbuilding in that country has been established.
sentences.cn: 他对那个国家造船业的垄断已经建立起来。

means.word_mean: 垄断权, 专利权,独占；专利；专利品

sentences.en: In many countries tobacco is a government monopoly.
sentences.cn: 在许多国家, 烟草由政府专营。

jushi.english: His monopoly of shipbuilding in that country has been established.
jushi.chinese: 他对那个国家造船业的垄断已经建立起来。

jushi.english: In many countries tobacco is a government monopoly.
jushi.chinese: 在许多国家,烟草是政府的专卖品。

jushi.english: Neither side has a monopoly of right or wrong.
jushi.chinese: 没有哪一方全对或不对。
